import styles from './Friends.module.css' import greenDot from '../../image/online.png' import redDot from '../../image/offline.png' import defaultImg from '../../image/defaultImg.jpg' console.log(defaultImg) const Friend = ({ friends }) => { console.log(friends) return ( friends.map(({ id, isOnline, avatar, name }) => (
  • {isOnline ? : }

    {!!name ? name : 'Your friend'}

    • )) ) } Friend.defaultProps = { friends: [], avatar: defaultImg, } export default Friend;
